name: ShastriQuotes
0:
”Alexa, open Shastri Quotes”
”Alexa, ask Shastri Quotes for a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shastri quotes
des:
Listen to some mind-blowing quotes from Ravi Shastri and let your inner self-burn your brain down with the cliche and obvious dialogues delivered right to your ears.

CAUTION: Don't try this out if you don't want to listen to the obvious.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
